Bayern - ALBA 93:88 (OT)

Bayern Munich repeated as BBL champions. They swept ALBA Berlin in the championship series to defend the title. Bayern claimed an overtime victory in Game 3 to complete the sweep. Vladimir Lucic (201-SF-89, agency: BeoBasket) posted 23 points to pace the champions.

ALBA got to a quick start. The Berlin team grabbed a 22:15 lead ten minutes into the game. ALBA maintained the lead throughout the second term. The visitors accumulated a 46:32 halftime lead. But Bayern turned things around in the second half. The hosts unloaded 25 points in the fourth period to force overtime. Bayern jumped to a 6-point lead in the extra period and raced to the victory. Nihad Djedovic (196-SF-90, agency: BeoBasket) posted 18 points, while Danilo Barthel (208-F/C-91, agency: Octagon Europe) added 15 points for the champions. Peyton Siva (183-PG-90, college: Louisville) answered with 21 points for ALBA.
